actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of earnings to be disregarded in determining an individual's eligibility for supplemental security income benefits and in computing the amount of such benefits.

summary.text: Amends title XVI (Supplemental Security Income) of the Social Security Act to increase from $780 per year to $1,200 per year the amount of earnings disregarded in determining an individual's eligibility for and amount of SSI benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVI of the Social Security Act to increase the amount of earnings to be disregarded in determining an individual's eligibility for supplemental security income benefits and in computing the amount of such benefits.
